TEI.2.document_title: Elias Wightman to Stephen F Austin, 04-29-1829

barker_notes.barker_summary: Elias R. Wightman to Austin, April 22, 1829. Concerning location of the "New Yorkers." Wants to prove the salubrity of the colony by their health. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 207

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Elias R. Wightman to Austin, April 22, 1829. Concerning location of the "New Yorkers." Wants to prove the salubrity of the colony by their health. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
